name: Imagine Lifetimes
description:
A satirical simulation game about the meaning of life. Born with the ability to choose, your actions and decisions shape the paths ahead of you. Face the inevitable through a series of life-changing predicaments as you choose your way to the end...

Features

  • Explore a wide variety of choices, paths and endings
  • Choose wisely, every choice has the potential to affect your lifetime
  • Question the absurdity of existence as you figure out what it means to be alive

WARNING: May contain traces of irony, skepticism and dark humor.
